content: By enrolling in a UA Payment Plan, the student agrees to: enroll by the first day of the semester to avoid late charges; pay all three installments on time regardless of reminders; verify class schedule and account accuracy in UAccess; pay each installment and other billed charges by the deadline; acknowledge checks returned for non-payment incur a $25 service charge and two dishonored checks may end eligibility; financial aid is separate from the plan; if collection/attorney services are needed, student pays costs and fees; re-enroll each semester.

Tuition section terms: $75 enrollment fee is non-refundable. The student is responsible for tuition even if not attending; official withdrawal is required to obtain any available refund/reduction (per Dates and Deadlines). The student agrees to pay all tuition/fees on the plan and must check their account after adding/dropping classes to determine any impact on payments.
